name: Starmie
flavorText:
Its central core
glows with the
seven colors of the rainbow. Some
people value the
core as a gem.

previous.name: Staryu
previous.flavorText:
If its body is torn, it can grow
back if the red core remains.
The core flashes at midnight.

next.name: Mr. Mime
next.flavorText:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.
